import React from 'react' import ShortBoxList from '../../Components/ShortBoxList/ShortBoxList' import { CourseData } from './CoursesData' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const CoursesCategotries = () => { return ( <>

} headpara={ <>

Join our comprehensive Quranic education program designed to nurture both knowledge and spiritual growth at your own pace.

} >
{CourseData.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

Read More
))}
) } export default CoursesCategotries
